attributes.action: Reformation Proposals for The Department of Work and Pensions
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to initiate a campaign for reform of the Department for Work and Pensions and also Job Centre Plus.
The issues to be addressed are;
Improved efficiency of administration.
Increased accountability of staff. A proposed option being employee identification numbers, to improve clients ability to identify who they have communicated with.
Improvements to the delivery of services.
The abolition of the "Balance of probability" policy.
Easy, instant access to DWP and JCP policies and legislation through any Job Centre or the internet. Currently there is no easy way to attain up to date information on policies etc. directly.
The disposal of ATOS health assessments and the use of the NHS with payments going to the NHS.
Satisfaction surveys, which will have results shown publicly and independently. This would measure performance and highlight problem areas.
There are many other areas where reform is needed.
